mdRecord.dcterms:description: Headquarters of the Rochford Foundation, which is a private nonprofit founded by Tim Rochford in 2008. Its primary focus is restoring and maintaining the mansion and grounds and offering this beautiful setting to other local nonprofits that serve children. The Foundation also provides philanthropic support to a variety of childrenâ€™s charities. -- http://www.burragemansion.org/rochford-foundation.php [work]
